content.introduction:
Converts standard library type traits of the form 
traits<...>::type
 and

traits<...>::value
 into 
traits_t<...>
 and

traits_v<...>
 respectively.

For example:

std
::
is_integral
<
T
>::
value


std
::
is_same
<
int
,
 
float
>::
value


typename
 
std
::
add_const
<
T
>::
type


std
::
make_signed
<
unsigned
>::
type

Would be converted into:

std
::
is_integral_v
<
T
>


std
::
is_same_v
<
int
,
 
float
>


std
::
add_const_t
<
T
>


std
::
make_signed_t
<
unsigned
>
